english: He can be punished by long jail sentences .
chinese: 他可能受到长期监禁的处罚。

english: The judge sentenced him to prison for a month ..
chinese: 法官判处他一个月监禁。

english: The judge gave him a nine-month suspended sentence .
Many more died on their way to captivity .
chinese: 更多的人在运往监禁处的途中死去。

english: He was sent to prison for five years .

chinese: 监禁造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He was given two prison sentences , to run concurrently .
chinese: 他两罪均判监禁，同期执行。

english: He goes to prison for ten days .
The committee is working to get the prisoners freed .
chinese: 委员会正尽力搭救那些遭监禁的人出狱。

english: The men were imprisoned for plotting against the government .
chinese: 这些人因密谋反对政府而被监禁。

english: He has been put in solitary confinement for attacking another prisoner .
chinese: 他因伤害另一囚犯而被隔离监禁。

english: They want the criminal locked up in the good old-fashioned way .
chinese: 他们希望把罪犯用行之有效的老办法监禁起来。

english: Such an offence shall be punished by detention in prison or at hard labour .
chinese: 这样的罪行将处以监禁或服苦役。

english: After his misdeeds had been proclaimed, he was solemnly walled up .
chinese: 宣布了他的罪状之后，他就被严密地监禁起来。

english: A desperate attempt to rescue the three captive princes failed .
chinese: 为营救三位被监禁的王子的一次冒险尝试没有成功。
